Why ReadyServer

Built for developers who ship fast

We stripped away the complexity. What's left is a VPS platform that gets out of your way.

Mobile-first control

Full server management from your pocket. Deploy, resize, monitor, and restart — all from our iOS and Android apps.

Instant deployment

Go from zero to running server in under 3 minutes. No waiting, no provisioning queues. Just deploy.

Pay-as-you-go billing

No lock-in contracts. Pay only for what you use with unmetered bandwidth. Stop anytime, billing stops immediately.

Unmetered Bandwidth

No bandwidth caps or overage charges. Transfer as much data as you need with our generous fair-use policy.

FAQ

Common questions

Everything you need to know about ReadyServer VPS hosting.

Pure pay-as-you-go with no lock-in contracts. You only pay for the time your VPS is actually running. Stop your server anytime and billing stops immediately. Enjoy unmetered bandwidth with no overage charges or hidden fees — transfer as much data as you need. We accept credit/debit cards, Apple Pay, Alipay, and cryptocurrencies.
Most VPS instances are ready in under 3 minutes. Select your datacenter (Singapore or Hong Kong), choose your OS and resources, and hit deploy. No queues, no waiting. You'll have SSH access immediately.
Absolutely. Scale your vCPU and RAM up or down anytime through the dashboard or mobile app. Most resizes complete within minutes. Storage upgrades are also available but are one-way (you can increase, not decrease).
We offer Ubuntu 24.04, AlmaLinux (8.10, 9.4), CentOS 7.9, and Windows Server 2022. You can also upload custom ISO images for specialized deployments. For Windows, check out our Windows VPS hosting page.
Yes! Our native iOS and Android apps provide full server control. Deploy new servers, monitor resources, restart instances, resize specs, and manage billing — all from your pocket. Download the app to get started.
Yes. With full root access, you can configure your VPS however you like — run multiple sites with nginx/Apache virtual hosts, Docker containers, or any other setup. There are no artificial limits on domains or sites. Learn more in our multi-site hosting guide.
